mean_cn: n. 悬疑；焦虑；悬念；  adj. 令人挂心的，令人心焦的，产生悬念的
mean_en: a feeling of worry or excitement that you have when you feel that something is going to happen, somebody is going to tell you some news, etc.
sentence: At the end of the movie, viewers were left in a state of great suspense.
sentence_trans: 这部电影在结尾给观众留了个巨大悬念。
word_etyma: sus在…下面 + pense挂 → 一颗心挂着 → suspense担心，悬而不决
